title: Publication design research
content:
Hello everyone! I’m currently compiling information on all things pertaining to publication design particulary newsletters and newspapers. Also the use of grids, both column and modular.  
Any info from any source will be greatly appreciated

Thanx  
Mister M

author: Mister M

comments.content: Although it has been years since I’ve seen a copy, I seem to remember that Allen Hurlburt’s [_Layout, the Design of the Printed Page_](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153021/http:/www.ilab.org/services/catalogues.php?membernr=1507&catnr=337&pg=9&br=) was a pretty good treatise on the subject.

A good blog site to visit is [newsdesigner.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153021/http:/www.newsdesigner.com/) as it covers info and issues related to newspaper design. Many useful links as well.
Hey guys thanx soo much. Great help
